nodes.text: Pawp was a video store on the planet Coruscant. Billboards were put up in order to advertise the store. These billboards read "video store" - "Pawp". The logo of the establishment showed the name of the business written in Aurebesh, with the last P (Peth) upside-down.

Pawp is introduced in the The Clone Wars episode Sabotage. Concept art for The Clone Wars shows that the business was created for the episode To Catch a Jedi, where Pawp was a pawn shop simply known as "Pawn".
